benediction.data.night.6.name: Channeling
benediction.data.night.6.description: While not activated: at the Start of each turn, you may either Reserve 1 Card or activate this ability to put all the reserved cards in your Hand
benediction.data.night.6.select.title: Select Your Channeling Option
benediction.data.night.6.select.content: While you are Channeling, you can choose to either: Reserve the top Card in your Deck or Cash-Out which will move all the reserved Cards to your Hand regardless of your max Hand Size. Cashing-out will end the Channeling.
benediction.data.night.6.unbanked.title: Channeled Cards
